Objects¶

Created on Thu May 30 10:28:04 2019

@author: sadra

We have three type of objects:

  • H-polytopes

  • Zonotopes

  • AH-polytopes

class pypolycontain.lib.objects.AH_polytope(T, t, P, color='blue')¶

Bases: object

Affine Transformation of an H-polytope Attributes:

P: The underlying H-polytope P:{x in R^q | Hx le h} T: R^(n*q) matrix: linear transformation t: R^{n*1) vector: translation

pypolycontain.lib.objects.Box(N=None, d=1, corners=[])¶

returns N-dimensional Box corners=typle of 2 numpy arrays: lower_corner and upper_corner
